main.name: Kartik Upender
main.bio: Hello there!, I’m Kartik, a Web Developer, now advancing towards becoming a Full-stack developer. I specialize in creating scalable web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. Driven by curiosity and a passion for technology, I constantly upgrade my skills to stay at the cutting edge. I thrive on challenges and excel in transforming complex requirements into high-quality solutions. Let’s connect and see how my expertise can add value to your next project.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Led the development of a digital platform for PMKISAN, simplifying land registry for over 30,000 farmers in the Northeast. Utilized AngularJS and C# with ASP.NET Core MVC, optimizing data processing by 20% with PostgreSQL and integrating five internal APIs to enhance platform communication by 15%.

work.title: Front-End Developer Intern
work.description: Collaborated with a team of six developers to design, develop, and deploy responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, Ensured cross-browser compatibility across five major browsers while contributing to a 15% reduction in page load times and gaining hands-on experience throughout the software development lifecycle.

projects.title: Exercise Recommender (React JS, RestAPI, Tailwind CSS)
Safe Haven (Next JS, Metamask, Moralis, Prisma)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
